nodes.text: Brian Lemay (born June 10, 1960) was a layout artist for the Droids and Ewoks animated series. Having graduated from an animation program in 1980, Lemay has worked in the field for more than three decades, working on shows like Inspector Gadget, Smurfs, and Care Bears, also branching out into drawing comic characters and sculpting. He is a teacher and has written a number of books on animation.
